author: Yoda____
title: amazing
review: This game is amazing just for the minigames especially the ones at the end. Unfortunately I think there's a glitch at the end of the game so if you've completed it; don't go back to the space station via the train. Pretty much everything in this looks like lego which wasn't even done with "Lego Batman" and once more, the minigames make an awesome game on their own.
